text: Sir Thomas Picton was a British military officer who lived from 1758 to 1815. He was born in Wales and served in various military campaigns throughout his career. Picton is best known for his role in the Napoleonic Wars, particularly his involvement in the Peninsular War in Spain and Portugal. == References == Category:1758 births Category:1815 deaths Category:British Army generals Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Welsh constituencies Category:UK MPs 1812â€“1818
title: Thomas Picton
